articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Remove 'workload' word': Gavaskar slams IND's preparation for 1st Test vs SA - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India's dreams of recording a first-ever Test series win in South Africa went up in flames with an innings defeat in Centurion. | Cricket
articles.content: India's dreams of recording their first ever Test series win in South Africa went up in smoke with an innings defeat in Centurion. India were blown away for 131 runs with just two of their batters sc… [+2607 chars]
